xml.brief: Query the status of geocache reports

desc.p: This method queries the status of one or more geocache reports that were submitted trough services/caches/reports/submit.

returns.p: An array, each element corresponding to one of the provided reports IDs and having one of these values:

ul.li: null - there is no report with this ID, or

li.p: status - the status of the report, which is either Unassigned, In progress or Closed,
admin_name - the team member's username, or null if the report is not in progress.
